name: Tiwiii
overview:
Basic Intro Tiwiii (pronounced TV, obviously) is a simple medium to share what you watch with your friends, while keeping up to date with the shows your currently watching.

Share You can share what you watch or favorite shows by creating respective lists.

Keeping Upto Date Tiwiii will provide you the dates of when the next episode of the shows your currently watching are coming out.

Discover Shows The ratings system (like/unlike) will help you find the shows that are most “liked” helping you discover highly rated shows. That’s not all, you can find out what shows are mostly favorited and currently watched.

Episodic Information Don’t know which episode you last watched of your favorite tv show? You can browse the simple user interface to get episode by episode information.

Check in to episodes You can “check in” to episodes to let your friends know what your watching then and now, ala FourSquare and GetGlue.

More features to come. Currently limited to only Twitter users. Just sign in through twitter and your in.
